about_the_game:
Edingir Odyssey is a turn-based, action-oriented RPG with a deep and highly interactive combat system, quirky and high energy hand-drawn art, and a vision that builds on inspiration from a certain beloved classic with an expanded design and skill-based gameplay!

Master Action Commands, Flashy Commands, and various Blocking techniques to outplay your enemies and hype up your audience, building up Special Points that can be spent on a huge variety of Moves with which to outsmart and overpower any opponent. Manage a trio party by adjusting their positions and passing their Actions between one another to maximize survivability, utility, and damage output within the limitations of an Action Stock system. Upgrade your party members with Battle Cards using Battle Points earned from battle, which provide you with various stat upgrades and multiple levels of upgrades for each of your party members' Moves!

Edingir Odyssey offers a wealth of action and fun in the combat and exploration that fans of both traditional RPGs and action games can enjoy. All the while, take part in a rich story about overcoming loss and adversity through togetherness and collaboration, where you and many friends come together to grow from hardship and find new purpose, and rise up against an inscrutable force that's cursed Edingir and isolated its inhabitants since its inception.

Edingir Odyssey is still in early development, but you can follow and support the project! A playable demo will be coming soon, as well! More info in the pinned thread among the community discussions.
